name: FunkRCA demo
description:
This is a demo of velocity based avoidance. It is based/inspired by the theory behind RVO2 and ORCA.

  • 3D implementation (2D in the works). 
  • Agents use Ackerman steering.
  • Implements both moveable and stationary obstacle avoidance.
  • There are 4 demos: 1) Fish avoiding a wall, 2) Fish being congested travelling through narrow openings, 3) Flyer vs missiles, 4) Flyers vs flyers in formation. 
  • Demos have have attributes that can be varied to explore more about velocity based avoidance.
